extension.description: An unofficial video addon to connect to IPTV Services, based on original code by esxbr. 1.Open IPTV Xtra. 2.Click "Open IPTVXtra Settings". 3.Select your Servers Portal, enter your Donation#, Select EPG Source(Default is kens). 4.Enable Language and Genre Filters.(if Req'd.) 5.Save your Settings. *.IPTV is an "Alternate" method to access TV. *.VOD is to access VOD Features. 6.Click VOD or IPTV (This will load your data from the Server). 7.Click Auto-Setup PVR IPTV Simple. * PVR Client is already Enabled. Click "TV" on Home Screen. Enjoy. /kens
